description:
---Game Features
Simple character control + stage gimmicks to be unlocked at the same time
This is a finger-tip confusing action puzzle.
Challenge yourself with numerous difficult puzzles!

There are more than 60 stages! Play slowly or compete for time.
It's up to you how you enjoy it!

---Story
In a place unknown...
a lost traveler appears
the cat-like young girl
with goal that lies in another place
She seeks a way out!

---7 “NYAN Medals” scattered throughout the stages.
Get them all and complete the gallery!

---Is it too hard?
You can play all the stages from the beginning by selecting a stage.
name: Pixel Game Maker Series NYANxTECH
intro:
Simple yet challenging!
An action puzzle game that will wreak havoc on your brain and fingertips!
